examples.example: 我一眼就看到了人群中笑容灿烂的他。

translate.english: I saw him with a bright smile in the crowd at a glance.

examples.example: 我走进教室一眼就看到了放在课桌上的礼物。

translate.english: I walked into the classroom and saw at a glance the gift placed on the desk.

examples.example: 我来到山顶，一眼就望见了远处如诗如画的美景。

translate.english: I came to the top of the mountain and saw at a glance the picturesque beautiful scenery in the distance.
